mapper.select: select * from (select * from scrap where category='industryStatus' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join industryStatus on cscrap.categoryseq = industryStatus.seq
select * from (select * from scrap where category='codeQuestion' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join CodeQuestion on cscrap.categoryseq = CodeQuestion.seq
select * from (select * from scrap where category='project' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join Project on cscrap.categoryseq = Project.seq
select * from (select * from scrap where category='itnews' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join Itnews on cscrap.categoryseq = Itnews.seq
